title: Bloomberg Markets: Foregger on Delivering Digital for Advisors

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Rob Foregger Co-Founder Next Capital Discussing "Integration is the Key to Delivering Optimized, Digitized and Ultimate Experiences" from Pershing Insite 2017 in San Diego.
